entries.text: You slowly gain consciousness. As your eyes open, you discover that you are in an abandoned laboratory, but you have no idea how you got there, or more importantly, how to get out. A tingle runs down your spine as you stand up in a dimly lit room that smells of mildew. What is your first move?

2.text: Leave the room immediately

entries.text: You don't find anything else, all thats's in the room is a carpet and a wall tapestry

2.text: Leave the room

entries.text: You find a rusty crowbar in the corner and get the wall tapestry off. There's a window!

1.text: Try to climb out the window

2.text: Don't climb out the window, use the door instead.

entries.text: Yikes! You're 7 storeys up, much too high to jump. Maybe there's a ledge?

1.text: Feel for a ledge to the right.

2.text: Feel for a ledge to the left.

entries.text: There is a ledge!

2.text: Don't risk falling and go back inside.

entries.text: You retreat back into the room.

2.text: Go out the door.

entries.text: You're extremely dehydrated.

1.text: No I'm not. I'll be fine.

2.text: Look for some water

entries.text: You see a rusty pipe with a little bit of water in it. Take the chances and drink it?

2.text: No

entries.text: You exit the room and find yourself in a hallway.

2.text: Go right

entries.text: You turn right, and see another door which you enter. On the other side is a disfigured mutant made entirely out of poorly written code, called the Glitcher. It roars and sends a beam of corrupted code at you.

2.text: Dodge to the right

entries.text: You turn left, and see another door which you enter. On the other side is a small kitten.

2.text: Keep your distance

entries.text: While feeling for a ledge, you slip and fall 7 storeys down onto concrete. Ouch.
You climb on to the ledge. Suddenly, a gust of wind knocks you down and you fall 7 storeys onto concrete. Ouch.
You collapse from dehydration.
You take your chances with the rusty pipe water and drink it. You now have tetanus and are completely paralyzed.

you evade the blast, but as you roll, a stray drop of bug ridden code (c++ written by an intern) hits your right foot. it will begin to spread and you will die when it reaches 51% of your body. you are at 2%. to cure the infection, kill the Glitcher.

2.text: Run around to the side of the Glitcher

entries.text: The Glitcher anticipates your move, and before you can react, he forces you to reply 'LGTM! :) ' on a junior dev's bug ridden commit and push it to production without review. Linus Torvalds smites you for this sin.

Well that was foolish. The Glitcher has caught you. stun him by figuring out what this javascript snippet will return: 
console.log(5 + true);
You try to wriggle free from the Glitchers grasp, but it uses its sharp fangs to SQL inject you with malicious code. You bleed out from your wounds.
You manage to stun the glitcher long enough to escape, using the power of javascript's broken type coercion. What now?

2.text: Try to debug the Glitcher, restoring him back to his human form.

entries.text: You spot a door and manage to leave the Glitcher in the dust. Unfortunately, Jens Moenig, creator of Snap! is incredibly mad at you for making your create task in Rust and decides that he will use the supreme power of Alonzo to end your playthrough.
You examine the Glitcher, and discover a USB port on the back of his neck. You climb up and plug in your laptop. It's hacking time! What Linux distro will you use?

2.text: Kali Linux

entries.text: You've chosen Arch, the neckbeard distro. Overwhelmed by the complicated install process, you break down mentally and fall to the floor, uncontrollably screaming 'I USE ARCH BY THE WAY!!'. mission failed, we'll get em next time
you boot up Kali Linux, and open the terminal. What do you type?

2.text: if (goingToKillMe) { pleaseDont() };

entries.text: Good thinking with the forkbomb, but you made one crucial mistake: you're running it on your own laptop, not the Glitcher's brain. Your laptop overheats and shuts down and the Glitcher infects you with ransomware. Your family must now pay 400 million dollars in Bitcoin to save you.
The glitcher doesn't understand javascript, and its circuitry begins smoking trying to process the abomination. It disappears in a cloud of smoke, and reveals a man once it clears

1.text: Try to escape through the other door.

2.text: Go up to the man.

entries.text: Well, well, well, says Jens Moenig, creator of Snap. It looks like you decided to write your AP create task in Rust instead of my glorious Snap. Alonzo, take him away! Alonzo, the mascot of Snap, drags you away to a dungeon where you will be forced to write Snap code for all eternity

[Dr. Steiner]: Whoa, you saved me! I thought I'd be trapped in that thing forever. I'm Dr. Steiner by the way, I was a researcher here before... the incident. Here, let me get that c++ off of you, it was written by an intern here, so it's basically poison. Look at you! It's all over both of your legs. 5 more minutes and you would have turned into a Glitcher too. Anyway, lets get out of here, I know a back way

2.text: Screw him, I can do this myself. I'll just leave through that door over there.

entries.text:
You follow Dr. Steiner through a small trapdoor that you didn't notice before. He leads you out of the laboratory. 
 [Dr. Steiner]: 'Good luck out there stranger, this is where I leave you. I must try to save the others. Don't come back.' 
You won!
You're now on the left side of the Glitcher, and you ran fast enough that it didn't see you yet. But the infection is now at 20% of your body.

1.text: Try to escape through the door on the other side of the room.

2.text: Try to debug the Glitcher, restoring him back to his human form.

entries.text: As your hand reaches for the kitten, it transforms into an eldritch horror beyond human comprehension and lunges for you.

2.text: Dodge right

entries.text: The creature lunges right, trying to predict where you are going to go. As you slide left, it turns to look at you and ends up smashing into a wall, becoming stunned momentarily.

1.text: Look for a weapon to fight it with

2.text: Try to escape through the other door while it's stunned

entries.text: you look around the room and spot a Sikorsky HH-60G Pave Hawk helicopter in the corner. Get in?

2.text: That probably belongs to someone, and I also don't know how to fly it.

entries.text:
[Creature]: Dude, thats's so lame. That's literally a military helicopter. Why wouldn't you get in. 
 You die of sheer embarassment.

You get in to the helicopter and start the engines. as the blades start spinning, the Creature regains connsciousness and lunges for you, only to get sliced up by the blades and turned into a fine purple mist. The roof slides off of the room.

1.text: Get out of the helicopter and use the door, that's probably easier

2.text: Fly out of the room

entries.text:
You fly out of the building and into the sky. You've escaped the lab! 
Just kidding. the USAF would like back their helicopter that you stole, and the radar systems on board show that a squadron of F-35 Lightning II jets are closing in.

1.text: I dont want to mess with the Air Force, I surrender!

2.text: Fight back, by releasing flares to counter any heatseeking missiles and engaging the jets in combat with the onboard .50 caliber machine guns

entries.text: You surrender, and have technically escaped the lab but are sent to federal prison
Somehow, you are able to singlehandedly defeat a squadron of 5th generation fighters using only a helicopter. You land outside the laboratory. You have escaped
You slide to the right, and the Creature predicts your movement and intercepts you, then swallows you whole. Inside it, you see a door and a pair of scissors.

2.text: Cut your way out with the scissors

entries.text: It's pretty disgusting, but you manage to cut your way out, killing the Creature in the process

1.text: Exit through the door in the room

2.text: Cut a hole in the 6 inch steel wall using the scssors

entries.text: It takes a while, but you cut your way out and are now outside the lab. You escaped!

Trusting your intuition, you stay away from the kitten. It spontaneously explodes, sending a shockwave around the room that knocks you over. When you get back up, you see that the kitten has transformed into Terry Davis, the schizophrenic programmer

2.text: Tell him that you use Temple OS

entries.text:
[Terry Davis]: Who am I? Who am I?! I'll tell you who I am, you ignorant fool! I'm the man who built the TempleOS from scratch, the one and only Terry Davis! Don't you dare question me or my work! 
With the power of schizophrenia and the Holy C programming language, davis erases you from existence
[Terry Davis]: Wait, really? No one who has ever come through here has ever said that! I was gonna kill you, but you seem chill. Here, go on out through this trapdoor.

1.text: Cool, but I think I'll just use the door.

2.text: Say thanks to Mr. Davis and go through his trapdoor.

entries.text: The trapdoor leads to a slide that safely takes you down and lets you out outside the lab. You have escaped!
